summary: This is a consent to search form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General, authorizing the search and seizure of computer/electronic equipment. An individual signed the form voluntarily, relinquishing privacy rights to the devices and stored information. The form is dated July 26, 2019.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The person who signed the consent form, authorizing the DOJ OIG to search and seize their computer/electronic equipment. Their name is not visible in the provided text.

events.title: Consent to Search Electronic Equipment
events.description: An individual signed a consent form authorizing the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General to search and seize their computer/electronic equipment and storage media.

keyFacts: A consent to search form was signed on July 26, 2019, authorizing the DOJ OIG to search computer/electronic equipment.
The individual relinquished constitutional privacy rights to the devices and any information stored on them.
Any evidence found on the devices may be used against the individual in criminal, civil, or administrative proceedings.
The form indicates the consent was given voluntarily without threats, duress, or promises.
The signing individual's name is not visible in the provided text excerpt.
